name: STUMPER (itch)
description:
Get in the shoes of Captain L, a professor, and adventurer when your ship crashes. You crash on a planet with an unknown material that you've been searching for years. You have 10 minutes to collect 6 nails, all while STUMPER chases you. Captain L is helpless. - AND SO ARE YOU.

Controls

  • Move  Captain L - WASD
  • Jump - Space Bar 

Credits

  • Dallen Larson - Programmer, Artist, Creative Director, Musician, Level Designer
